item.description:
For people who like Chinese food, want to learn more Chinese culture, and meet friends. gives everyone an opportunity to come and make new friends, practice their Chinese or English, and enjoy dinner with us. Bring your friends, and come by, relax, practice in either language of your choice, and enjoy being part of our growing community.

We share the food, and we split the bill evenly.

We look forward to seeing you there! We gonna be there from 6:00pm to 8:00pm( or later depend how many people will attend)

for more info. please check http://fuloon-restaur...
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a sign up or ask in front

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Friday Dinner Table
